Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Monosodium glutamate ( MSG ) administration to neonatal rodents produces convulsions and results in numerous biochemical and behavioral deficits .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| convulsions |

In this paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "convulsions." A convulsion is a series of violent, involuntary contractions of the muscles, which can be a symptom of various neurological disorders.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| convulsions |

In this paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "convulsions." I have removed "Monosodium glutamate ( MSG ) administration to neonatal rodents" and "numerous biochemical and behavioral deficits" as they do not clearly refer to diseases. Monosodium glutamate (MSG) is a flavor enhancer, not a disease. Similarly, "numerous biochemical and behavioral deficits" are conditions or symptoms, not diseases.
